name: Christmas Chase
description:
'Christmas Chase' is a single player arcade game.it is funny and casual.the graphics and sounds of the game is beautifull.in the game you will find yourself in a chase.you meet with a snowy christmas day with santa and beautifull game graphics.The game buttons and menus are awesome.The goal of the game is to avoid the bad snowmans who tries to catch you and not to touch the frame for not to fail.

Show your ability to play games, Have fun !
